title: 1910 Obak James TWO Color Variations (red/orange) ** SOLD **
author: shammus

posts.post_title: 1910 Obak James TWO Color Variations (red/orange) ** SOLD **
posts.post_content:
Neat pair of Obak James color variations!  The card should be red as you can see, but a missed color pass resulted in one of the cards coming out a really neat neon orange color.

Offering up as a pair, asking $65 for BOTH cards, delivered.  

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=635226&d=1726866705[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=635227&d=1726866725[/IMG]

Thanks!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
Lowering the price down to an even $100 on the pair!
One more bump down to $65 for BOTH cards....neat background-color variations which you don't see often at all in any prewar set!
I'll take them, if they're still available.

[quote name="doug34-36" post=2500251]I'll take them, if they're still available.[/QUOTE]

Thanks for the note, they're all yours!  Sent you a PM just now....
